function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Higher number of fatalities and economic loss","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict social distancing measures and public education campaigns","Technologies":"Smart city technology for monitoring and enforcement","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Delay in implementing social distancing measures at an early stage of the pandemic","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities and limited time for countermeasures","Mitigation":"Early implementation of social distancing, rapid response plans for healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring systems, rapid testing technology","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"}]}
